reviewText: I enjoyed all the movies and can't beat the price!

The best of the three was Four Weddings and a Funeral, it is a pretty good movie.
 Hugh Grant is a little more likeable in this movie than in others.

Impromptu was a look at how the artists and wealthy lived.

Nine Months was one that you see once and that was enough.
I lost my copy of Impromptu, one of my all-time favorite movies. I was thrilled when I found this three-film DVD. Now, I not only have Impromptu again, I have two other great Hugh Grant movies!
